description: The hot-desk membership lets you work at an available desk anytime you arrive at the DBLOCK.
Boxes are separate booths of different sizes, usually used by small working teams.
Events are for networking, sharing knowledge & experience, generating new ideas and fun.
Special educational programs, workshops, and trainings in many fields, curated and led especially for professional development.
Meetings rooms for productive gatherings, adopted with quality digital conference tools to functionalities.
An entire office space for middle-sized teams, small organizations, and business collectives of 15-20 members.
